text: Need Justin Mitchell for Chemist Warehouse campaign. Budget around $1,560, looking for 2 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Podcast guest, 1 x Twitter post, 1 x Radio interview, 2 x YouTube short. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
